name: UK PostCode
content:
Welcome to RegExr v2.0 by gskinner.com!

Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. Undo mistakes with cmd-z. Save & Share expressions with friends or the Community. A full Reference & Help is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial.

Sample text for testing:
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"'
12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42
555.123.4567	+1-(800)-555-2468
foo@demo.net	bar.ba@test.co.uk
www.demo.com	http://foo.co.uk/
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar


@brand I am looking hotel with 2 beds in dorset 

so here input would be 
("I am looking hotel with 2 beds in dorset", "UK")
Output must be 
Loc = Dorset
Text before Loc = I am looking hotel with 2 beds in
Text after Loc  = NULL
@brand in rg2 9fr - do you know any place to stay?
@brand what about hotel in brighton 
@brand i like to stay in heathrow with my wife and 2 kids ?
@brand do you know hotel around queen street, Victoria London
@brand any hotel in and around RG2
@brand any hotel in and around W1T 2RH
@brand any restaurants near SL1 3XF
@brand any studios near W5 5RH
@brand Gloucester is cool, I like to book hotel here

The following list shows all valid Postcode formats. "A" indicates an alphabetic character and "N" indicates a numeric
character.
FORMAT EXAMPLE
AN NAA M1 1AA
ANN NAA M60 1NW
AAN NAA CR2 6XH
AANN NAA DN55 1PT
ANA NAA W1A 1HQ
AANA NAA EC1A 1BB
author: Jabran Rafique
